Transport 2.1 Use free public transport Public transport in Switzerland isn't cheap. But luckily, several Swiss cities offer free use of public transport to their visitors. Upon check-in at your accommodation in Bern , Basel , Lucerne , Lausanne , Montreux , Geneva and the whole Canton of Ticino , you receive a ticket that lets you use local transport for free during the time of your stay.
